SELECT MCODE, WD_CODE, PRICE, TO_CHAR(WD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WD_DATE, STATUS, TO_CHAR(SUCCESS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') SUCCESS_DATE, ACCOUNT FROM WITHDRAWAL WHERE MCODE = #{mcode} ORDER BY WD_DATE DESC

SELECT (SELECT MID FROM MEMBER WHERE MCODE = E.FROM_MCODE) FROM_MCODE, (SELECT M_NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MCODE = E.FROM_MCODE) TO_MCODE, E.PEACHCOUNT, TO_CHAR(SEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') SEND_DATE FROM EXPEACH E WHERE E.TO_MCODE = #{mcode} ORDER BY E.SEND_DATE ASC

SELECT S.READER_MCODE, TO_CHAR(S.READ_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') READ_DATE, S.BJ_MCODE, (SELECT MID FROM MEMBER WHERE MCODE = S.READER_MCODE) MID, (SELECT M_NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MCODE = S.READER_MCODE) NIC FROM SUBSCRIBE S WHERE S.BJ_MCODE = #{mcode} ORDER BY S.READ_DATE ASC
